sentences.en: ...everything from small boats to ocean racers.
sentences.cn: …从小船到海洋赛艇等所有的一切。

sentences.en: Be the real professional moto racer and champion on super - cross!
sentences.cn: 是真正的专业摩托英豪和超级冠军!

sentences.en: He was driving a Mercedes racer at 100 mph and almost came to grief.
sentences.cn: 他当时驾驶着一辆梅塞德斯赛车以每小时100英里时速度飞驰，险些出事。

sentences.en: I believe Speed Racer knew that Racer X was really his brother.
sentences.cn: 我相信高速赛车手知道赛车是他的亲兄弟.

sentences.en: In fact, Beedo never really considered himself a racer to begin with.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 贝多从来就根本不当自己是个车手.

sentences.en: In Rad Racer the goal is simple; just keep driving.
sentences.cn: 在这个游戏中,目标很简单, 就是一直行驶下去.

sentences.en: In the racial horse - race, the white racer s race - horse won.
sentences.cn: 在种族赛马运动中, 白人赛手的马获胜.
意大利的山坡速降滑雪冠军

sentences.en: Mustang is a wild horse, not a domesticated racer.
sentences.cn: 野马是野性的马, 不是已驯化的赛马.

sentences.en: The racer lapped at unprecedented speed.
sentences.cn: 跑车以空前的速度跑完全程.

sentences.en: The racer meant to win the 500 - meter race at all risks.
sentences.cn: 这个参赛者下定决心无论如何要赢得500公尺赛跑的胜利.

sentences.en: The racer meant to win the 500 - mile race at all hazards.
sentences.cn: 这位竞赛者决心不顾一切危险,赢得这场500英里的车赛.

sentences.en: The right rear wheel on Willy's rally racer will not roll well.
sentences.cn: 维利的赛车的右边后轮转动得不好.

sentences.en: This super - charged blue street racer is ready to crash!
sentences.cn: (译)这辆超动力的幽蓝街头疾车将准备好去撞击对方!

sentences.en: Tim Powell is a former champion powerboat racer.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆·鲍威尔曾是汽艇比赛冠军。

sentences.en: You mean the fewer points you get , the better racer you are?
sentences.cn: 你是说得分越少的选手就越优秀?

words.tran_cn: 生动的；保持原味的；适于赛跑的；猥亵的
属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门弟
比速度，参加竞赛；全速行进
使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进

trans.tran_cn: 专供比赛用的动物，比赛用的车辆，比赛者，（美洲）黑蛇
trans.tran_en: A racer is a vehicle such as a car or bicycle that is designed to be used in races and therefore travels fast
